DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study examine effectiveness web-based CBT protocol ( entitle Meeky Mouse ) treatment child Selective Mutism Singapore . The researcher hypothesize Meeky Mouse program would associate high frequency speak behavior , low level anxiety , great improvement clinician-rated severity mental illness , high clinician-rated improvement score post-treatment .
